resources.string:
![Ema Personal Wiki](http://janwillemboer.nl/ema/android/about_ema.png)

 **Ema Personal Wiki for Android** is a notebook with linkable pages for tracking your ideas, tasks, projects, notes, brainstorms - in short, your life - in the most flexible way. 

 This software was written by Jan Willem Boer in 2010. You can contact him with suggestions or bugs at ema@janwillemboer.nl or via the website <http://www.janwillemboer.nl/blog/ema-personal-wiki>.

 This software is provided 'as-is', without any express or implied warranty. In no event will the author(s) be held liable for any damages arising from the use of this software.

 If you bought this software, this means you have bought a license, which allows you personally to use the software. So, if you buy a new Android device, or if you have two Android devices, you may install the software more than once. Please contact Jan Willem Boer in case of any trouble with this. And because the author is in a generous mood, you may also install the software for your spouse and children if this helps you and/or them.

 This software is also available as a Windows app for a desktop computer. If you bought the Android app, you can download the Windows Ema Personal Wiki app too.

Home
======

This is the homepage for your personal wiki. You can edit this page by touching the Edit button in the toolbar.

 Create a link to a new or existing page by surrounding a word with curly brackets like {Todo}, or by using a WikiWord (a word with mixed casing).


To synchronize the wiki pages between this device and a desktop computer, enter your Dropbox credentials via 'Sync Settings' in the menu.


This wiki uses [Markdown formatting](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown#Syntax_examples) for text editing.


![Ema Personal Wiki](http://janwillemboer.nl/ema/android/about_ema.png)


Ema Personal Wiki is a notebook with linkable pages for tracking your ideas, tasks, projects, notes, brainstorms - in short, your life - in the most flexible way. If you have any further questions, don't hesitate to contact the developer at ema@janwillemboer.nl or go to <http://www.janwillemboer.nl/blog/ema-personal-wiki>.
